question: Cabinet has approved to sign a MoU with which country on renewable energy cooperation?
explanation:
The Union Cabinet gave ex-post facto approval to the signing of a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) between India and France on renewable energy cooperation.
The MoU was signed in the month of January 2021. The MoU involves exchange and training of scientific and technical personnel, information and data, organisation of workshops and seminars and development of joint research projects.
